_header: Thy doom is given after the law
_description: Five couplets interspersed in a Latin sermon, spoken by Iusticia, Potencia, Veritas, Sapiencia and Misericordia

Bod649.First Lines:
iustitia þi dom is ȝeuon after þe laweI may
                    þe noȝt help aȝeyn my saw…
Bod649.Last Lines:
…misericordiaIn ne may thole þat þou be spiltI
                    ȝyue me raunsoun for þi gilt
